reviewText: I put these word world dvd's on for my kindergartners during lunch time at school and it keeps them mesmerized, they love them...so I decided to buy this for my granddaughter who is 4 yrs old and she also loves it. They are Educational and very colorful, the animation is just adorable, the characters are so cute and at times funny that I even get a chuckle watching them. Overall it kept my granddaughter interested and she was learning to spell the words along with the characters. We now have a collection.
